item.description:
To those members who have responded yes or maybe for this Wednesday, I have sent out a message concerning how to locate us on the beach. Please check your email, and contact me if you did not receive the information. If no message, please check your spam and trash folders first. Thanks.


Every Wednesday evening July 7 through Aug. 11

The annual Blues on the Beach begins its 2010 season on Wednesday, July 7 from 6-8pm. This is a free weekly event - no charge for parking or admission! Just bring your beach chair and dinner - relax with friends and enjoy the great music. Some people bring elaborate dinners (potluck?) and set up a table to share with their group.

This is held every Wednesday evening July 7 through Aug. 11. Rain or shine - rain location is the Windjammer Lounge down the road. (Last year's rain location was the Knickerbocker.)
--------------------

Blues on the Beach 2010 schedule
http://www.bluesonthe...

Directions to beach
http://www.bluesonthe...

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Blues on the Beach - Westerly
